acc-opt-text: Iwe unokamhina kuona kana kuti neimwe nzira haugone kuzadza hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Tinotenda nezvaunotora. Ngatizivisei chero nyaya uye isu tichaagadzirisa nekukurumidza.
feedback-text: Ipa mhinduro pane hCaptcha iwe uchangobva kuona
home-ent-2: Enda kune yedu itsva yakatsaurirwa saiti: BotStop.com
home-intro-body: Iwe unoshandisa captcha kuchengeta kunze bots? hCaptcha inodzivirira kuvanzika kwemushandisi, inopa mubayiro mawebhusaiti, uye inobatsira makambani kuwana data ravo rakanyorwa. Iko kudonhedza-mukutsiva kweRCAPTCHA: unogona kuchinja mukati memaminitsi.
home-intro-head: Misa yakawanda bots. Kutanga kudzivirira kuvanzika kwemushandisi.
home-main-1: Pakavanzika. Chengetedzwa. Kupera. Uye isu tinobhadhara iwe kuti uishandise.
home-main-2c: Ad ma network anoona vashanyi vako sechigadzirwa. Kune hCaptcha chigadzirwa ndiro basa ravanopa. Hatina hanya kuti vashandisi vako ndivanani, chete kuti vangangoita sei kukuvadza. Isu tinotsigira zvirongwa zvakaita seSecurity Pass, uye tinoshanda nesimba kuyera kuvanzika nekuchengetedzeka.
home-main-3c: Kurongeka kuri mukuda kwako uye kwedu. hCaptcha inoparidza-yakatarisana. Isu tinoshanda kuti tipe iwe chaiyo data uye turega iwe ufunge maitiro ekuishandisa. Mamwe machinda anopiwa na
home-main-3c2: makambani ekushambadzira. Izvi zvinoreva kuti bhegi rimwe nerimwe ravanovhara rinogona kudzikisa mari yavanowana.
home-main-4c: Sophisticated michina yekudzidza michina inoshandiswa neHCaptcha yekuona vanhu. Izvi zvinotitendera kuti tide mabasa mashoma ekutsamwisa kubva kune vashandisi vako uye kutora shoma yenguva yavo mukuita kudaro, uchiri kugadzira data rakanyorwa rakanyorwa rekunyorera vatengi.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha yakasununguka kushandisa vashandisi chero chero saizi. Nekudaro, kune emabhizinesi nemapuratifomu ayo anoda hutongi hwakawanda, mhinduro dzemabhizinesi edu dziripo.
home-main-plans2: hCaptcha mabhizinesi ekugadzirisa anochengetedza mamirioni evashandisi pamakumi emamirioni emawebhusaiti kune mamwe emakambani makuru pasi pano. Ndokumbira kuti ubate isu kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo, kana kushanya
home-main-plans3: hCaptcha mabhizinesi ekugadzirisa anochengetedza mamirioni evashandisi pamakumi emamirioni emawebhusaiti kune mamwe emakambani makuru pasi pano. Ndokumbira kuti ubate isu kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo, kana kushanya
page-acc-faq-1: Mubvunzo: hCaptcha Chikamu 508 + WCAG 2.0 inowirirana here? Mhinduro: Isu tinotenda kudaro: vese vashandisi vane chero chimiro chekukanganisa vanogona kuona iyo webhu uye nekupinda zvinyorwa pamafomu vanogona kuwana masevhisi akachengetedzwa neHCaptcha pane kunyoresa. Nekudaro, iri harisi zano repamutemo: iwe unofanirwa kuita yako yekuongorora, uchifunga nezve yako chaiyo kuitiswa kuti uve nechokwadi kuti iyi ndiyo nyaya yekuendeswa kwako.
page-acc-faq-2: Mubvunzo: Uri kushanda pane zvimwe zvinowanikwa (a11y) sarudzo, senge odhiyo? Mhinduro: Yaimbove yakakurumbira sarudzo senge odhiyo Captchas kusarura vazhinji vanoshandisa a11y uye vanokundwa zviri nyore neazvino michina kudzidza michina. Izvi zvakamanikidza zviripo parizvino matambudziko kuti awedzere kuve akaoma, achiunza ruzha, nguva isinganzwisisike, musanganiswa wemazwi, uye zvichingodaro kukunda vakunda. Isu saka hatisi kushingairira nezvenzira iyi pamwe nekunzvenga dambudziko racho zvachose, asi tichazvitora kana paine kudikanwa kubva munharaunda ye11. Nekudaro, isu tinofarira kwazvo kuvanzika kwePass for the Accessibility use kesi. Isu tinotenda kusanganisa yedu yazvino nzira ye11y nzira neakavanzika Pass kuburitswa ichabvumira vashandisi ve11y kuti vaongorore zvakachengeteka, vakachengeteka mukuziva kuti traffic yavo yakavanzika zvakanyanya, apo ichirambidza kubatwa zvisina kufanira kwakaitwa nevanozvibata bot kuti zvinoitika kana sarudzo dza11 dzavepo. Isu tiri vatori vechikamu vanoshanda muIETF yeboka rekumisa tekinoroji nyowani iyi.
page-acc-faq-3: Mubvunzo: Ko nezvekuvanzika? Ko kunyoresa kunoburitsa a11y kuvhurwa kwedata neimwe nzira here? Unoitei neemail? Mhinduro: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa kuvanzika kubva pasi kusvika kumusoro. Izvo zvakasiyana zvakasiyana pane zvechinyakare sarudzo senge reCAPTCHA iyo inowanikwa nevashandisi vekushambadzira, vane kukurudzira kukutevera pawebhu uye nekubatanidza iwe nehukama chaihwo. Hatimboshandisi kuwanika maemail kana info kune chero chinangwa kunze kwekufambisa a11y kushandiswa uye kudzivirira kushungurudzwa. Yedu yekuchengetedza mutemo ine yakazara uye ine mvumo mhinduro nezve mashandisiro atinoita data, asi mhinduro pfupi ndeyekuti hatifariri kukubatanidza iwe nemunhu ane nhoroondo yako yekutarisira.Tiri kuitawo parizvino kugadzirisa pane grafiti yekukurumidza kurasa yako email kero. tichiri kuchengetedza kugona kwedu kudzivirira kushungurudzwa, kupedzisa basa redu rePassword Pass.
page-acc-link-1: Kana iwe uri mushandisi wekuwanika, ndapota isaina apa.
page-acc-subhead: Kuverengera kuwanikwa kusingaoneki kwevashandisi vese vachiri kuchengetedza kuchengetedzwa
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha yakagadzirirwa kumisa bots nekuvaparadzanisa nevanhu. Miedzo inooneka chishandiso chiri nyore pane izvi, asi havasi vese vanogona kugadzirisa dambudziko rekuona. Nechikonzero ichi takagadzira nzira iri nyore, isingarwadzire kurega vaparidzi vanoshandisa sevhisi yedu chengetedza kuwanikwa kwevese vane yakazara Chikamu 508 uye WCAG 2.0 ichiteerera.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Mashandiro ayo Ivo vanopihwa cookie yakavharika iyo inogona kushandiswa kanoverengeka pazuva, asi inofanira kuzorodzwa maawa makumi maviri nemaviri kuburikidza ne login.Panenge dambudziko rikaiswa kune inowanikwa mushandisi pane chero saiti inoshandisa hCaptcha service, ivo vanozongo pfuura.
page-acc-tr-body: Mubvunzo: Ndichiri kuona dambudziko mushure mekuisa cookie. Chii chiri kukonzera izvi? Mhinduro: Izvi zvinowanzoitika nekuda kwekushandisa nehasha ad blocker kana anti-cookie kuwedzera, kana marongero anovharira macokie-saiti makuki, mune iyi kiyi kuki hcaptcha.com yakaiswa kana kuongororwa neHCaptcha JavaScript pane imwe saiti , kunge uya wauri kushanyira. hCaptcha inowanikwa makuki inoshanda nevose vanozivikanwa mabhurawuza uye ad blockers neyakagadzika marongero avo, saka kazhinji kukundikana kuri nekuda kweanti-anti-adblock zvinyorwa kana akafanana mutemo anotarisa mamwe masosi. Mhinduro: 1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com uye * .hcaptcha.com cookies mune yako ad blocker kana browser kuchengetedza kuwedzera. 2. Kana iwe uri kushandisa Bhurawuza bhurawuza, iyo isingaiti (kubva muna Kubvumbi 2020) inoita senge iine chero mhando yekokeni whitelist, enda kuZvido -> Shields -> Cookies uye sarudza Bvumira All Cookies. 3. Kana iwe uri kushandisa yazvino vhezheni yeSafari pane imwe ichangoburwa OS X 10,15 kana iOS 13. 4, Apple ichangobva kuchinja maitiro eSafari ane chekuita nekwechitatu-bato makuki, achivharira ese nekukanganisa. Isu tiri kuita mhinduro, asi panguva ino ndapota shanyira Safari Zvinodiwa, chikamu chekuvanzika, uye uncheck Webhusaiti yekudziya: Kudzivirira kuyambuka-saiti yekutsvaga kuitira kuti ikwanise kuwanika cookie kushanda sekutarisira. Mubvunzo: Ini ndinoshandisa akawanda michina. Ndinofanira kusaina kakawanda here? Mhinduro: Kwete. Ndokumbira ubayewo iyo sailing email yekutarisa inotumirwa kwauri pane imwe neimwe chishandiso chaunoshandisa kuitira kuti uise kuki.
page-acc-tr-title: Kune Vashandisi Vanowanikwa: Q & A uye Dambudziko rekutungamira
priv-hc-text: Ad ma network anoona iwe sechigadzirwa chavo. Hatidi. Hatina hanya kuti vashandisi ndivanaani, chete kuti vangangoita sei kuve noutsinye. Isu tinotsigira zvirongwa zvakaita seSecurity Pass, uye tinoshanda nesimba kuyera kuvanzika nekuchengetedzeka.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha inoparidza-yakatarisana. Isu tinoshanda kupa saiti data chaidzo uye tidzirege ivo vasarudze nzira yekuishandisa. Kurongeka kuri mukuda kwako uye kwedu. Mamwe machinda anopihwa nemakambani ekushambadzira. Chero iwo mabhodhi avanovhara anogona kuderedza iwo mapato.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: hCaptcha inobatsira yako yaunofarira webhu masevhisi kunze bots, spam, uye kushungurudzwa nekubvunza mibvunzo iri nyore iri nyore kuvanhu uye yakaoma kune michina.
why-hc-text: Pose paunopindura zvinonetsa, tinoshandisa mhando dzakajeka kuti uone kana uri munhu kana muchina. Iyo webhusaiti yawakashanyira inoshandisa iyi mhinduro kubatsira kugadzirisa ruzivo rwako pane yavo saiti nekuchengetedza bots.
